creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
inscription: Inside of front cover, black ink pen: this book / ez for Fly. / Why? cause / she inspires, / I can't lie. / you're friend / kate gage / (star) 2000 (star)
medium: Xerography, color offset lithography, collage, black ink pen, bound volume
title: Fuct
